latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hallways and other means of egress were observed obstructed and impassable
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: Safe sleep environment not provided in infant toddler service safe sleep environment does not comply with US CPSC and ASTM standards
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection toxic substances observed improperly stored so as to result in the potential for exposure or contamination of facility surfaces
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
